description: two bust length portraits; upper artist with grey hair wearing robe and white collar in an oval frame; lower in a rectangular composition with dark curly hair and wearing a dark robe; both artists turned right and looking at viewer; swag at top left of image
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: vol2 p.134 / Bannerman sculp / Edward Pierce Sen\'r & Jun\'r | on sheet in pencil: 2-711 / the only engraved portraits of these Artists
title: Edward Pierce, Sen'r & Jun'r
